text: 1. Click and drag the slider labelled 'color' until the color of the banana matches the gray color surrounding the banana
2. Click the box below 'show values' to see if the color matches or not
3. Click 'change shape' and try to match the color of the rectangle, then click 'show values' to see the result
4. You can play with the additional slider values and repeat steps 1-3 again.
5. At any point, click 'reset' to load the default settings
